abstract: Sallie Krawcheck, veteran of meteoric rises and falls, says women need sponsors to counteract the comfort zones in which men seek out other men because they have more in common.
snippet: Sallie Krawcheck, veteran of meteoric rises and falls, says women need sponsors to counteract the comfort zones in which men seek out other men because they have more in common.
lead_paragraph: SALLIE L. KRAWCHECK, once one of a handful of high-powered women on Wall Street, rose to the top levels — only to find herself out of work.

headline.main: Lessons on Being a Success on Wall St., and Being a Casualty
headline.print_headline: Lessons on Being a Success on Wall St., and Being a Casualty
